GP10bhp_05u:848: BhP_05.22.011/1 tata upariṣṭād dvi-lakṣa-yojanato nakṣatrāṇi meruṃ dakṣiṇenaiva kālāyana īśvara-yojitāni sahābhijitāṣṭā-viṃśatiḥ

GP10bhp_05u:852: BhP_05.22.015/1 tata upariṣṭād dvi-lakṣa-yojanāntara-gatā bhagavān bṛhaspatir ekaikasmin rāśau parivatsaraṃ parivatsaraṃ carati yadi na vakraḥ syāt prāyeṇānukūlo brāhmaṇa-kulasya
GP10bhp_05u:853_0: BhP_05.22.016 /1 tata upariṣṭād yojana-lakṣa-dvayāt pratīyamānaḥ śanaiścara ekaikasmin

GP10bhp_05u:939_3: pūyodaḥ prāṇarodho viśasanaṃ lālābhakṣaḥ sārameyādanam avīcir ayaḥpānam iti kiñca
GP10bhp_05u:940_0: BhP_05.26.007 /1 tatra yas tu para-vittāpatya-kalatrāṇy apaharati sa hi kāla-pāśa-baddho
GP10bhp_05u:940_1: yama-puruṣair ati-bhayānakais tāmisre narake balān nipātyate anaśanānudapāna-daṇḍa-tāḍana-santarjanādibhir
GP10bhp_05u:940_2: yātanābhir yātyamāno jantur yatra kaśmalam āsādita ekadaiva mūrcchām upayāti tāmisra-prāye
GP10bhp_05u:941_0: BhP_05.26.008 /1 evam evāndhatāmisre yas tu vañcayitvā puruṣaṃ dārādīn upayuṅkte
GP10bhp_05u:941_1: yatra śarīrī nipātyamāno yātanā-stho vedanayā naṣṭa-matir naṣṭa-dṛṣṭiś ca bhavati
GP10bhp_05u:941_2: yathā vanaspatir vṛścyamāna-mūlas tasmād andhatāmisraṃ tam upadiśanti
GP10bhp_05u:942: BhP_05.26.009/1 yas tv iha vā etad aham iti mamedam iti bhūta-droheṇa kevalaṃ sva-kuṭumbam evānudinaṃ prapuṣṇāti sa tad iha vihāya svayam eva tad-aśubhena raurave nipatati
GP10bhp_05u:943_0: BhP_05.26.010 /1 ye tv iha yathaivāmunā vihiṃsitā jantavaḥ paratra yama-yātanām upagataṃ
GP10bhp_05u:943_1: ta eva ruravo bhūtvā tathā tam eva vihiṃsanti tasmād rauravam ity āhū rurur iti sarpād
GP10bhp_05u:944: BhP_05.26.011/1 evam eva mahārauravo yatra nipatitaṃ puruṣaṃ kravyādā nāma ruravas taṃ kravyeṇa ghātayanti yaḥ kevalaṃ dehambharaḥ
GP10bhp_05u:945: BhP_05.26.012/1 yas tv iha vā ugraḥ paśūn pakṣiṇo vā prāṇata uparandhayati tam apakaruṇaṃ puruṣādair api vigarhitam amutra yamānucarāḥ kumbhīpāke tapta-taile uparandhayanti
GP10bhp_05u:946_0: BhP_05.26.013 /1 yas tv iha brahma-dhruk sa kālasūtra-saṃjñake narake ayuta-yojana-parimaṇḍale
GP10bhp_05u:946_1: tāmramaye tapta-khale upary-adhastād agny-arkābhyām ati-tapyamāne 'bhiniveśitaḥ kṣut-pipāsābhyāṃ
GP10bhp_05u:946_2: ca dahyamānāntar-bahiḥ-śarīra āste śete ceṣṭate 'vatiṣṭhati paridhāvati ca yāvanti
GP10bhp_05u:947_0: BhP_05.26.014 /1 yas tv iha vai nija-veda-pathād anāpady apagataḥ pākhaṇḍaṃ copagatas
GP10bhp_05u:947_1: tam asi-patravanaṃ praveśya kaśayā praharanti tatra hāsāv itas tato dhāvamāna ubhayato
GP10bhp_05u:947_2: dhārais tāla-vanāsi-patraiś chidyamāna-sarvāṅgo hā hato 'smīti paramayā vedanayā
GP10bhp_05u:947_3: mūrcchitaḥ pade pade nipatati sva-dharmahā pākhaṇḍānugataṃ phalaṃ bhuṅkte
GP10bhp_05u:948_0: BhP_05.26.015 /1 yas tv iha vai rājā rāja-puruṣo vā adaṇḍye daṇḍaṃ praṇayati brāhmaṇe
GP10bhp_05u:948_1: vā śarīra-daṇḍaṃ sa pāpīyān narake 'mutra sūkaramukhe nipatati tatrātibalair viniṣpiṣyamāṇāvayavo
GP10bhp_05u:948_2: yathaivehekṣukhaṇḍa ārta-svareṇa svanayan kvacin mūrcchitaḥ kaśmalam upagato yathaivehā-dṛṣṭa-doṣā uparuddhāḥ
GP10bhp_05u:949_0: BhP_05.26.016 /1 yas tv iha vai bhūtānām īśvaropakalpita-vṛttīnām avivikta-para-vyathānāṃ
GP10bhp_05u:949_1: svayaṃ puruṣopakalpita-vṛttir vivikta-para-vyatho vyathām ācarati sa paratrāndhakūpe
GP10bhp_05u:949_2: tad-abhidroheṇa nipatati tatra hāsau tair jantubhiḥ paśu-mṛga-pakṣi-sarīsṛpair maśaka-yūkā-matkuṇa-makṣikādibhir
GP10bhp_05u:949_3: ye ke cābhidrugdhās taiḥ sarvato 'bhidruhyamāṇas tamasi vihata-nidrā-nirvṛtir alabdhāvasthānaḥ
GP10bhp_05u:950_0: BhP_05.26.017 /1 yas tv iha vā asaṃvibhajyāśnāti yat kiñcanopanatam anirmita-pañca-yajño
GP10bhp_05u:950_1: vāyasa-saṃstutaḥ sa paratra kṛmibhojane narakādhame nipatati tatra śata-sahasra-yojane
GP10bhp_05u:950_2: kṛmi-kuṇḍe kṛmi-bhūtaḥ svayaṃ kṛmibhir eva bhakṣyamāṇaḥ kṛmi-bhojano yāvat tad aprattāprahūtādo
GP10bhp_05u:951_0: BhP_05.26.018 /1 yas tv iha vai steyena balād vā hiraṇya-ratnādīni brāhmaṇasya vāpaharaty
GP10bhp_05u:951_1: anyasya vānāpadi puruṣas tam amutra rājan yama-puruṣā ayasmayair agni-piṇḍaiḥ sandaṃśais tvaci niṣkuṣanti
GP10bhp_05u:952_0: BhP_05.26.019 /1 yas tv iha vā agamyāṃ striyam agamyaṃ vā puruṣaṃ yoṣid abhigacchati
GP10bhp_05u:952_1: tāv amutra kaśayā tāḍayantas tigmayā sūrmyā lohamayyā puruṣam āliṅgayanti striyaṃ
GP10bhp_05u:953: BhP_05.26.020/1 yas tv iha vai sarvābhigamas tam amutra niraye vartamānaṃ vajrakaṇṭaka-śālmalīm āropya niṣkarṣanti
GP10bhp_05u:954_0: BhP_05.26.021 /1 ye tv iha vai rājanyā rāja-puruṣā vā apākhaṇḍā dharma-setūn bhindanti
GP10bhp_05u:954_1: te samparetya vaitaraṇyāṃ nipatanti bhinna-maryādās tasyāṃ niraya-parikhā-bhūtāyāṃ
GP10bhp_05u:954_2: nadyāṃ yādo-gaṇair itas tato bhakṣyamāṇā ātmanā na viyujyamānāś cāsubhir uhyamānāḥ
GP10bhp_05u:955_0: BhP_05.26.022 /1 ye tv iha vai vṛṣalī-patayo naṣṭa-śaucācāra-niyamās tyakta-lajjāḥ
GP10bhp_05u:955_1: paśu-caryāṃ caranti te cāpi pretya pūya-viṇ-mūtra-śleṣma-malā-pūrṇārṇave nipatanti
GP10bhp_05u:956: BhP_05.26.023/1 ye tv iha vai śva-gardabha-patayo brāhmaṇādayo mṛgayā vihārā atīrthe ca mṛgān nighnanti tān api samparetān lakṣya-bhūtān yama-puruṣā iṣubhir vidhyanti
GP10bhp_05u:957: BhP_05.26.024/1 ye tv iha vai dāmbhikā dambha-yajñeṣu paśūn viśasanti tān amuṣmin loke vaiśase narake patitān niraya-patayo yātayitvā viśasanti
GP10bhp_05u:958: BhP_05.26.025/1 yas tv iha vai savarṇāṃ bhāryāṃ dvijo retaḥ pāyayati kāma-mohitas taṃ pāpa-kṛtam amutra retaḥ-kulyāyāṃ pātayitvā retaḥ sampāyayanti
GP10bhp_05u:959_0: BhP_05.26.026 /1 ye tv iha vai dasyavo 'gnidā garadā grāmān sārthān vā vilumpanti
GP10bhp_05u:959_1: rājāno rāja-bhaṭā vā tāṃś cāpi hi paretya yamadūtā vajra-daṃṣṭrāḥ śvānaḥ sapta-śatāni
GP10bhp_05u:960_0: BhP_05.26.027 /1 yas tv iha vā anṛtaṃ vadati sākṣye dravya-vinimaye dāne vā kathañcit
GP10bhp_05u:960_1: sa vai pretya narake 'vīcimaty adhaḥ-śirā niravakāśe yojana-śatocchrāyād giri-mūrdhnaḥ
GP10bhp_05u:960_2: sampātyate yatra jalam iva sthalam aśma-pṛṣṭham avabhāsate tad avīcimat tilaśo viśīryamāṇa-śarīro
GP10bhp_05u:961_0: BhP_05.26.028 /1 yas tv iha vai vipro rājanyo vaiśyo vā soma-pīthas tat-kalatraṃ
GP10bhp_05u:961_1: vā surāṃ vrata-stho 'pi vā pibati pramādatas teṣāṃ nirayaṃ nītānām urasi padākramyāsye
GP10bhp_05u:962_0: BhP_05.26.029 /1 atha ca yas tv iha vā ātma-sambhāvanena svayam adhamo janma-tapo-vidyācāra-varṇāśramavato
GP10bhp_05u:962_1: varīyaso na bahu manyeta sa mṛtaka eva mṛtvā kṣārakardame niraye 'vāk-śirā nipātito
GP10bhp_05u:963_0: BhP_05.26.030 /1 ye tv iha vai puruṣāḥ puruṣa-medhena yajante yāś ca striyo nṛ-paśūn
GP10bhp_05u:963_1: khādanti tāṃś ca te paśava iva nihatā yama-sadane yātayanto rakṣo-gaṇāḥ saunikā iva
GP10bhp_05u:963_2: svadhitināvadāyāsṛk pibanti nṛtyanti ca gāyanti ca hṛṣyamāṇā yatheha puruṣādāḥ
GP10bhp_05u:964_0: BhP_05.26.031 /1 ye tv iha vā anāgaso 'raṇye grāme vā vaiśrambhakair upasṛtān upaviśrambhayya
GP10bhp_05u:964_1: jijīviṣūn śūla-sūtrādiṣūpaprotān krīḍanakatayā yātayanti te 'pi ca pretya yama-yātanāsu
GP10bhp_05u:964_2: śūlādiṣu protātmānaḥ kṣut-tṛḍbhyāṃ cābhihatāḥ kaṅka-vaṭādibhiś cetas tatas tigma-tuṇḍair
GP10bhp_05u:965_0: BhP_05.26.032 /1 ye tv iha vai bhūtāny udvejayanti narā ulbaṇa-svabhāvā yathā dandaśūkās
GP10bhp_05u:965_1: te 'pi pretya narake dandaśūkākhye nipatanti yatra nṛpa dandaśūkāḥ pañca-mukhāḥ sapta-mukhā
GP10bhp_05u:966: BhP_05.26.033/1 ye tv iha vā andhāvaṭa-kusūla-guhādiṣu bhūtāni nirundhanti tathāmutra teṣv evopaveśya sagareṇa vahninā dhūmena nirundhanti
GP10bhp_05u:967_0: BhP_05.26.034 /1 yas tv iha vā atithīn abhyāgatān vā gṛha-patir asakṛd upagata-manyur
GP10bhp_05u:967_1: didhakṣur iva pāpena cakṣuṣā nirīkṣate tasya cāpi niraye pāpa-dṛṣṭer akṣiṇī vajra-tuṇḍā
GP10bhp_05u:968_0: BhP_05.26.035 /1 yas tv iha vā āḍhyābhimatir ahaṅkṛtis tiryak-prekṣaṇaḥ sarvato 'bhiviśaṅkī
GP10bhp_05u:968_1: artha-vyaya-nāśa-cintayā pariśuṣyamāṇa-hṛdaya-vadano nirvṛtim anavagato graha ivārtham
GP10bhp_05u:968_3: narake nipatati yatra ha vitta-grahaṃ pāpa-puruṣaṃ dharmarāja-puruṣā vāyakā iva sarvato
GP10bhp_05u:969_0: BhP_05.26.036 /1 evaṃ-vidhā narakā yamālaye santi śataśaḥ sahasraśas teṣu sarveṣu
GP10bhp_05u:969_1: ca sarva evādharma-vartino ye kecid ihoditā anuditāś cāvani-pate paryāyeṇa viśanti
GP10bhp_05u:969_2: tathaiva dharmānuvartina itaratra iha tu punar-bhave ta ubhaya-śeṣābhyāṃ niviśanti
GP10bhp_05u:970_0: BhP_05.26.037 /1 nivṛtti-lakṣaṇa-mārga ādāv eva vyākhyātaḥ etāvān evāṇḍa-kośo yaś
GP10bhp_05u:970_1: caturdaśadhā purāṇeṣu vikalpita upagīyate yat tad bhagavato nārāyaṇasya sākṣān mahā-puruṣasya
GP10bhp_05u:970_2: sthaviṣṭhaṃ rūpam ātmamāyā-guṇamayam anuvarṇitam ādṛtaḥ paṭhati śṛṇoti śrāvayati
GP10bhp_05u:970_3: sa upageyaṃ bhagavataḥ paramātmano 'grāhyam api śraddhā-bhakti-viśuddha-buddhir veda
GP10bhp_05u:971: BhP_05.26.038/1 śrutvā sthūlaṃ tathā sūkṣmaṃ rūpaṃ bhagavato yatiḥ
GP10bhp_05u:972: BhP_05.26.038/2 sthūle nirjitam ātmānaṃ śanaiḥ sūkṣmaṃ dhiyā nayed iti
GP10bhp_05u:975: BhP_05.26.039/3 gītā mayā tava nṛpādbhutam īśvarasya
